text: The 2019 FFAS Senior League is the 39th edition of the FFAS Senior League, the top football league of American Samoa organized by the Football Federation American Samoa. This season started on 23 August 2019. ==Teams== These are the teams for the 2019 season. *Black Roses *Green Bay *Ilaoa and To'omata *Lion Heart *Pago Youth *PanSa *Royal Puma *Tafuna Jets *Taputimu Youth *Utulei Youth *Vaiala Tongan ==League table== Rest of season cancelled due to measles outbreak and irrelevance. ==Results== Round 1 - 23 and 24 August Utulei Youth 2-2 Vaiala Tongan Royal Puma 6-0 Tafuna Jets Taputimu Youth 2-2 PanSa United Ilaoa & To'omata 1-1 Lion Heart Pago Youth 27-0 Black Roses Green Bay (BYE WEEK) Round 2 - 31 August Vaiala Tongan 5-0 Green Bay Lion Heart 3-0 Tafuna Jets Black Roses 1-14 Taputimu Youth Utulei Youth 10-3 Ilaoa & To'omata PanSa United 0-4 Royal Puma Pago Youth (BYE WEEK) Round 3 - 7 September Utulei Youth 3-0 Tafuna Jets Black Roses 13-0 Royal Puma Vaiala Tongan 1-1 Ilaoa & To'omata Pago Youth 14-0 Green Bay Lion Heart 3-1 PanSa Taputimu Youth (BYE WEEK) Round 4 - 14 september Utulei Youth 6-0 PanSa Ilaoa & To'omata 0-0 Green Bay Vaiala Tongan 3-0 Tafuna Jets Taputimu Youth 2-6 Pago Youth Black Roses 1-2 Lion Heart Royal Puma (BYE WEEK) Round 5 - 28 September Royal Puma 3-9 Pago Youth Green Bay 0-3 Taputimu Youth Black Roses 0-5 Utulei Youth Vaiala Tongan 0-3 PanSa Round 6 - 5 October Vaiala Tongan 7-1 Black Roses Pago Youth 5-1 Lion Heart Green Bay 3-0 Tafuna Jets Taputimu Youth 5-8 Royal Puma Ilaoa & To'omata 0-3 PanSa Utulei Youth (BYE WEEK) ==References== ==External links== Category:FFAS Senior League seasons American Samoa FFAS Senior League
title: 2019 FFAS Senior League
